data.text: @kirstypup Thanks Kirsty, what's his name and are you able to send us a pic of the both of you?
@SundayBrunchC4 My son made this for me for mother’s day 10 years ago when was 2 years old at nursery I love it 😊 https://t.co/pcLaoRxvo5
@SundayBrunchC4 Thanks, hope this is ok? She's called Grace and we're from Lymm in Cheshire. https://t.co/fcy1DSalU5
@TraceyBtint Thanks Tracey, could you tell me what her name is, where you're from and send a pic of the both of you if you have one please?

@SundayBrunchC4 Please could you give a shout out to my mum, 89 yr old Ellen Hendeson who is very poorly in hospital for mother’s day. We are all going to visit her so she knows she’s loved. She’s in Tyne & Wear. https://t.co/dgA1RlmKUC

@SundayBrunchC4 Last year my wonderful, creative 7 y/o daughter made me this very 'unique' bracelet which took her hours, so I was compelled to wear it all day. She told me later on at home that I had it on upside down! 😂🙈 https://t.co/80bPKOdEyN
